description.ruby-sapphire:
Tucks in the head, then
attacks on the next turn.
description.emerald:
Tucks in the head, then
attacks on the next turn.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user raises its
DEFENSE in the 1st
turn, then attacks
in the 2nd turn.
description.diamond-pearl:

head to raise its
Defense in the first
turn, then rams the
foe on the next turn.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User then charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
